A free mental health tool
for

Put in your headphones, select a soundscape, and follow a calming voice as it guides you to focus on different sounds. With looping soundscapes and randomized instructions every play is different, ensuring each listen is just as effective as the first.

Real-world sounds, unique sessions

Unlike most ATT tracks, Metattune simulates real environments. And with randomized verbal cues, your practice is just as effective as the first time, every time.

Your favorite new habit? Track it

Research shows one of the best way to build new habits is to track them. Create a local profile and watch your progress towards a better you.

in to the world around you.
